inputSpec.label: Reads
inputSpec.help: A file, in fasta or fastq format, containing the reads to be classified.
inputSpec.name: reads

inputSpec.label: Kraken database
inputSpec.help: A gzipped tar archive containing a kraken database (database.idx, database.kdb, taxonomy/nodes.dmp and taxonomy/names.dmp).
inputSpec.name: database

inputSpec.help: Extra command-line options that will be passed directly to the kraken invocation. Example: --quick --only-classified-output
inputSpec.label: Extra command-line options
inputSpec.name: extra_options

outputSpec.label: Classification
outputSpec.help: A gzipped text file with the classification output.
outputSpec.name: classified
